commands.name: search-documentation
commands.title: Search Documentation
commands.description: Search and browse Fumadocs documentation by category

commands.name: manage-docs
commands.title: Manage Documentation Sources
commands.description: Add, remove, or toggle visibility of documentation sources

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
